title: Hardware Systems Integration Engineer - Apple Vision Pro
summary: Apple Vision Pro is a revolutionary spatial computer that seamlessly blends digital content with physical space.
description: Upon joining our team as a Hardware System Integrator, you will be applying your engineering expertise and working with cross-functional teams to realize consumer products. You will collaborate with various groups to bring a product from concept to mass production, solve engineering problems, and perform circuit characterization.
preferred_qualifications: Experience designing high volume products, familiar with leading PCB technology, knowledge in CPU/SOC, power management, analog circuits, etc., expertise in board CAD tools, ability to learn quickly, strong social skills, excellent written skills.
pay_benefits: Base pay range between $175,800 and $312,200. Apple employees have the opportunity to become Apple shareholders, receive benefits like medical and dental coverage, retirement benefits, discounted products, reimbursement for educational expenses, discretionary bonuses, and relocation assistance. Apple's benefit programs are subject to eligibility requirements.
